doc.field: MCH documents, including:Flyer for state hearing (1986), MCH constitution, Brooklyn branch flyer; Request to speak at budget hearing (1974); Letter to NY Times(1974); Press release (1964); Division of Housing and Community Renewal (DHCR) hearing flyer (1986); Undated press release (1970s: Rockefeller); Tenant News(1969); MCH Maximum Base Rent (MBR) flyer (1995); Anti-Giuliani flyer (1997); "A Program for Housing in the Public Domain" flyer (undated); Picket flyer (undated); testimony on NYC NOW program (1992); Testimony on Senior Citizen Rent Increase Exemption (SCRIE) hearing (1992); Testimony on lead paint abatement (1992); Testimony on city-owned building rules (1992)
